mapper.select: select transno, username, bank, branch, actype, acnumber, acname, amount, done, createdt from transfer where done = #{done} order by createdt asc
mapper.insert: insert into transfer (transno, username, bank, branch, actype, acnumber, acname, amount, done, createdt) values (#{transno}, #{username}, #{bank}, #{branch}, #{actype}, #{acnumber}, #{acname}, #{amount}, false, #{createdt})
